Visit a honey bee hive and learn about their social structure and communication methods, and if they could help humans create sustainable, eco-friendly architecture.
Talk to a chimpanzee about their problem-solving abilities and if they could collaborate with humans to develop new technologies.
Speak with a dog about their ability to detect scents and if they could help humans develop more effective tracking systems for search and rescue missions.
Visit a school of fish and learn about their migratory patterns and if they could help humans navigate the ocean better.
Speak with a bird about their ability to fly and if they could teach humans how to create a more efficient and sustainable mode of transportation.
